infobox.Japanese title:: 少年探偵団遭難事件  (Shōnen Tantei-dan Sōnan Jiken)
infobox.Cast:: Conan Edogawa  Ran Mouri  Kogoro Mouri  Detective Boys
infobox.Voice Cast::
Voice Cast:



Minami Takayama as Conan Edogawa  Wakana Yamazaki as Ran Mouri  Akira Kamiya as Kogoro Mouri  Yukiko Iwai as Ayumi Yoshida  Ikue Otani as Mitsuhiko Tsuburaya  Wataru Takagi as Genta Kojima, Next Conan's Hint  Toshihiko Seki as Teruhiko Kasuga  Waka Kanda as Shinobu  Masaaki Tsukada as Old man

sections.Situation: The Detective Boys and the Mouri family go to a water park and witness the dysfunctional interaction of a girl named Shinobu and her fiancée Kasuga. Some time later the kids discovers an S.O.S. which Teruhiko Kasuga claims is false, but Shinobu is nowhere to be found. What is he trying to hide, and can the Detective Boys save whoever the victim is, or will they meet their tragic fate?
sections.People:
- Kasuga family heir
- Kasuga Corporation member
- Victim (drowned - injured)
- Teruhiko's girlfriend
- Local trash picker
- Kasuga Corporation president
sections.Anime:
- The names of the characters in the Funimation Dub are:
- Teruhiko Kasuga - Colt Lielander
- Shinobu - Tandi
sections.Trivia:
- The ocean coast reappears in a painting in Yokosuka Castle from The Last Wizard of the Century.
- Parrotfish are saltwater fish.
- This wasn't dubbed in Arabic probably due to females wearing swimsuits.
